# 6.3-1

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text{Minimize} \quad & W = 20y_1 + 10y_2 \\
\text{Subject to} \quad & 5y_1 + y_2 \geq 6 \\
& 2y_1 + 2y_2 \geq 8 \\
& y_1, y_2 \geq 0
\end{aligned}
$$

# 6.3-5

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text{Minimize} \quad & W = 10y_1 \\
\text{Subject to} \quad & y_1 \geq 3 \\
& -2y_1 \geq -8 \quad (\Rightarrow y_1 \leq 4) \\
& y_1 \geq 0
\end{aligned}
$$

- 최적해: $y_1 = 3 ⇒ W = 30, x_1 = 10, x_2 = 0 ⇒ Z = 30$

# 6.3-9

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text{Minimize} \quad & W = 15y_1 + 25y_2 \\
\text{Subject to} \quad & y_1 \geq 5 \\
& y_2 \geq 4 \\
& y_1 + 2y_2 \geq 3 \\
& y_1, y_2 \geq 0
\end{aligned}
$$

- 최적해: $y_1 = 5, y_2 = 4 ⇒ W = 175$

# 6.4-1

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text{Minimize} \quad & W = 10y_1 + 20y_2 \\
\text{Subject to} \quad & 2y_1 + y_2 = 5 \\
& 3y_1 + 2y_2 \geq 4 \\
& y_1 \leq 0, \quad y_2 \text{ 자유변수}
\end{aligned}
$$

# 6.4-4

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text{Maximize} \quad & W = 4y_1 + 10y_2 \\
\text{Subject to} \quad & -4y_1 + 5y_2 \leq 5 \\
& 2y_1 - 10y_2 \leq 10 \\
& y_1, y_2 \geq 0
\end{aligned}
$$

- 쌍대문제 불가능 → 원문제 무한해

# 6.4-10

\begin{array}{|c|c|c|c|c|}

\hline

x_1 & 0 & 1 & 0 & 5 \\
x_2 & 0 & 0 & 1 & 3 \\
\hline
